issue.title: [Python] Expose Arrow C++ Consumer API to pyarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14082](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14082). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Once we have ARROW-14081, we need to add pyarrow bindings to allow use from Python.
